item.description: Action Actions are genarated from configuration and grouped by namespace. Usage krab action namespace name [arguments] Example For view refresh action you would use: krab action view refresh -name my-view-name
Krab version The version command prints the version of Krab. Usage krab version Example $ krab version krab 0.2.4 Build a2aa572cd37e64c38f16925c1152a2bed1fc4c0a 2021-07-04
